name: Dancing Hut
description:
Test your skill ! Very hard !

-Tap anywhere to switch legs and try to figure it out

-Swipe up or down after falling to restart quickly

Work in progress crazy weird idea about the magical house on chicken legs,home to Baba Yaga, on its disastrous walk through the forest full of ridiculous pixel gore.

Feel free to give your ideas for future updates :)

Looking for crazy people with pixel art talent to create strange and obscure minigames:)
